Sell out your next production.

Really Useful Group have teamed up with Evently to offer your adult amateur society a professional solution for managing your ticket sales and publishing your event online.

Find out more

Evently, exclusive technology partner with the Press Association, are working with Andrew Lloyd Webber's Really Useful Group to bring you a pioneering event product that will help you increase the box office sales and efficiency of your productions.

Event pages for online ticket sales

Input your details about your upcoming adult amateur productions on your own dedicated event pages to handle all ticket sales, becoming the center of your marketing for your events.

Tell the world with a single click

With your event page created, you can instantly publish your event to two dozen relevant event websites, on social media and on your own unique interactive event page.

Get your event discovered

Manage your local audience easily and increase your reach when discovered by a completely new audience online.

Manage your ticket sales

A hassle-free ticketing platform where you can track all of your sales in one place. We handle the payments so you can rest easy.

Your data is safe.

All customer data is automatically recorded, and everything is secure, so you have everything you need to make your next wave of shows a success.
